title: stuck logging into chat service
body: Virtually every time I login It stays stuck on logging into chat service, I do not know if anyone else is getting this issue or has in the past and might have some trouble shooting tips. I googled it and nothing seems to help. Thanks for any assistance.

replies.body: i get that just about everytime now. sometime within a week this has started. i havent played for a week due to family. and now when i log in it doesnt connect. also in game it keeps randomly disconnecting me. every 10 minutes or so.

I fixed the chat bug on my client, here is what i did:

1. Ran as admin
2. logged in incorrectly
3. logged in correctly

Now you can opt to log in correctly as well, it should produce the same results.
